name: pnp-sp-fx-aces-oneDriveImageOnlyCarousel
title: OneDrive Carousel
shortDescription: This solution provides a carousel that takes images from a OneDrive folder using microsoft graph and ACE and display only the current image.
longDescription: This solution provides a carousel that takes images from a OneDrive folder using microsoft graph and ACE and display only the current image.
